DESCRIPTION: Login with correct username and password
TEST STEPS: "username" and "password" used as username and password respectively
RESULT: Credentials accepted, taken to greeting page

TEST STEPS: Username misspelled or improperly capitalized while password correct. Eg: "usernm" or "Username"
Password misspelled or improperly capitalized while username correct. Eg: "passwrd" or "Password"

DESCRIPTION: Login with incorrect username and password
TEST STEPS: Username and password both misspelled or improperly capitalized
